title: X509CredentialsSchema
description: The x509 certificate for authentication mode Certificate.

certificateSecretName.description: The name of the secret containing the certificate and private key (e.g. stored as .der/.pem or .der/.pfx).

intermediateCertificatesSecretName.description: A reference to the secret containing the combined intermediate certificates in PEM format.

keySecretName.description: A reference to the secret containing the certificate private key in PEM or DER format.
